Summary: Lime green pin point flash of light.
divs: Sighting DetailsI tried putting this report in last night but for some reason it did not make it threw. I just read the report of the Maryland sighting at 9:30 pm so decided to try to resubmit the form. I was outside on my porch at 11 pm. I was smoking a cig. and saw a bright flash of light in the SE that caught my eye. I stood there looking for the source. I then saw a lime green point of light pulse in the sky. I watched for another minute trying to make out what was making the light because it was overcast. I saw a faint dark red object moving in the clouds where the yellow green light appeared. I was not scared. These things used to scare me but now I am used to it. I have seen and report ufo's before. I am sure the investigators are sick of hearing from me. Which is why I almost didn't report this until I read the other sighting report. I wonder if anyone near Turnerville saw the same object.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around June 10th 2009
